short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple calculator for computing CGPA based on target grades

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CG Calc is a simple to use calculator which aims to help students out by calculating their CGPA using a target CGPA. The extension includes the ability to scrape the grades from the university studentsâ€™ portal, setting target CGPAs and calculating required CGPA from the input provided. It is particularly beneficial for students to monitor their performance on their courses with a few clicks only.
